channel.title: Everytime i go in the prince jail either as the prince or jailed it crash my game
channel.description:
#### What happened? Everytime i get in the prince jail game crash
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? play the jail interrogation and go back to day
#### Steps to reproduce: Everytime i get in Prince jail
#### Comments: Tried to repair the game install didn't fix

item.title: Everytime i go in the prince jail either as the prince or jailed it crash my game
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
If you could, there might be a crash dump in your Steam folder, if not just grab your logs next time the game crashes.

You can find it here:

http://i.imgur.com/r3ehCAL.png

You can post them in the Discord server’s bug channel or upload them here and it will be looked into!

https://discord.gg/tol

Read full topic
item.source: Everytime i go in the prince jail either as the prince or jailed it crash my game
